name: Rubber
description:
Roll as far as possible.
Destroy as much as possible.
Gain experience and unlock unique locations.

Realistic physics and a procedurally generated worlds filled with bonuses and destructible obstacles are ready to challenge your Tire rolling skills.

Game Has 3 Modes

  • Single Game - Throw the wheel by choosing the direction and force of the blow. Use boosters to destroy or avoid obstacles. Drive the wheel as far as possible, collecting new boosters and bonuses along the way.
  • Status Game - Compete with other players to advance to the top of the pyramid. Each victory will bring status points, and the position will take away.
  • Make-a-Bet - Try your luck! There will be more rubbers (game currency) in the game, but for this you have to place a bet.

Global player rankings - With the ability to watch the replay of the champion's throw!

Add the game to your WISHLIST, please, and tell your friends!

Just Keep It Rolling!
